instructions: Go to Settings > Control Center > Customize Controls, then tap next to Screen Recording. Swipe up from the bottom edge of any screen . On iPhone X or later or iPad with iOS 12 or later, or iPadOS, swipe down from the upper-right corner of the screen. Press deeply on gray record icon and tap Microphone. Tap Start Recording, then wait for the three-second countdown. Open Control Center and tap red record icon . Or tap the red status bar at the top of your screen and tap Stop.
